title: PRAY FOR MEXICO PLEASE

replies.body: Es por eso que se esta ayudando c:
replies.body_tagged: Es por eso que se esta ayudando c:

replies.body: Or let's do something productive. As many of you are students or with low spending money I am not expecting anyone here to donate any money. But please share the links I am about to provide as maybe someone you know has the money and wants to donate but doesn't know how to. I am putting 2 websites that are very validated from Unicef and Oxfam. Please spread these two links as far as your reach can. Thank you.
